title: Rahu Transit in the 6th House: Outsmarting Challenges
summary: When Rahu transits the 6th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, competition, conflicts, and daily challenges intensify—but so does your ability to overcome them strategically. You become highly driven to defeat rivals, solve complex problems, and gain advantage through unconventional methods. Work pressure can increase, and health routines require attention. This transit favors victory in disputes, exams, and competitive environments, provided ambition is guided by discipline and ethical awareness rather than obsession.

sections.title: Career
points: Risk of burnout if balance ignored

sections.title: Finance
points: Expenses on health or work stress

closing: Rahu in the 6th house brings victory through strategy, but true mastery comes when ambition is balanced with health and ethics.
